segment.source: About Microsoft Application Virtualization 4.6 SP1
segment.target: About Microsoft Application Virtualization 4.6 SP1

segment.source: About Microsoft Application Virtualization 4.6 SP1
segment.target: About Microsoft Application Virtualization 4.6 SP1

segment.source: About Microsoft Application Virtualization 4.6 SP1
segment.target: About Microsoft Application Virtualization 4.6 SP1

segment.source: Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6 SP1 provides the following enhancements and new features:
segment.target: Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6 SP1 provides the following enhancements and new features:

segment.source: Improved App-V sequencer – the App-V 4.6 SP1 sequencer has been updated to help improve the sequencing process.
segment.target: Improved App-V sequencer – the App-V 4.6 SP1 sequencer has been updated to help improve the sequencing process.

segment.source: The enhancements include a more predictable packaging experience, and help at each step of the sequencing process.
segment.target: The enhancements include a more predictable packaging experience, and help at each step of the sequencing process.

segment.source: Click any of the following links for more information about the new version of the App-V sequencer.
segment.target: Click any of the following links for more information about the new version of the App-V sequencer.

segment.source: App-V Package Accelerators can be used to automatically sequence large, complex applications.
segment.target: App-V Package Accelerators can be used to automatically sequence large, complex applications.

segment.source: Additionally, when you apply an App-V Package Accelerator, you are not always required to manually install an application to create the virtual application package.
segment.target: Additionally, when you apply an App-V Package Accelerator, you are not always required to manually install an application to create the virtual application package.

segment.source: For more information about App-V package accelerators, see About App-V Package Accelerators (App-V 4.6 SP1).
segment.target: For more information about App-V package accelerators, see About App-V Package Accelerators (App-V 4.6 SP1).

segment.source: Enhanced support for sequencing different types of applications.
segment.target: Enhanced support for sequencing different types of applications.

segment.source: For more information about the different types of applications, see How to Determine Which Type of Application to Sequence (App-V 4.6 SP1).
segment.target: For more information about the different types of applications, see How to Determine Which Type of Application to Sequence (App-V 4.6 SP1).

segment.source: Enhanced support for using App-V project templates.
segment.target: Enhanced support for using App-V project templates.

segment.source: For more information about App-V project templates, see How to Create an App-V Project Template (App-V 4.6 SP1).
segment.target: For more information about App-V project templates, see How to Create an App-V Project Template (App-V 4.6 SP1).

segment.source: Step-by-step help during sequencing.
segment.target: Step-by-step help during sequencing.

segment.source: For an example of the new step-by-step see Type of Application Page (Learn More).
segment.target: For an example of the new step-by-step see Type of Application Page (Learn More).

segment.source: Enhanced reporting to help identify sequencing issues.
segment.target: Enhanced reporting to help identify sequencing issues.

segment.source: For an example of the new reporting, see Files Excluded Page Dialog Box (App-V 4.6 SP1).
segment.target: For an example of the new reporting, see Files Excluded Page Dialog Box (App-V 4.6 SP1).

segment.source: Support for using a read-only cache on RDS - App-V 4.6 SP1 now supports using a shared, read-only cache in both VDI and RDS environments.
segment.target: Support for using a read-only cache on RDS - App-V 4.6 SP1 now supports using a shared, read-only cache in both VDI and RDS environments.

segment.source: For more information about sharing a read-only cache on RDS, see How to Configure a Read-only Cache on the App-V Client (RDS).
segment.target: For more information about sharing a read-only cache on RDS, see How to Configure a Read-only Cache on the App-V Client (RDS).

segment.source: Support for sequencing the Microsoft .NET Framework 4 - App-V 4.6 SP1 now supports sequencing the Microsoft .NET Framework 4.
segment.target: Support for sequencing the Microsoft .NET Framework 4 - App-V 4.6 SP1 now supports sequencing the Microsoft .NET Framework 4.

segment.source: Customer Feedback and Hotfix Rollup – App-V 4.6 SP1 also includes a rollup up of fixes to address issues found since the App-V 4.6 release.
segment.target: Customer Feedback and Hotfix Rollup – App-V 4.6 SP1 also includes a rollup up of fixes to address issues found since the App-V 4.6 release.

segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: Provides the most up-to-date information about known issues with Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6 SP1.
segment.target: Provides the most up-to-date information about known issues with Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6 SP1.
